text:
Created attachment 30565
patch to fix in trunk

More incorrect namespace URIs and use of <tagclass> rather than <tag-class> in various test webapps
creator: jboynes@apache.org

text: Thanks for the report and the patch. It was applied to trunk and 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.43 onwards.
creator: violetagg@apache.org
